official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Interior to acquire parcels of land commonly known as Fisherman's Cove and Gull Island for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge in Monmouth County and Ocean County, New Jersey.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge a parcel of land know as Fisherman's Cove in Monmouth County, New Jersey, and a parcel of land known as Gull Island in Ocean County, New Jersey.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Interior to acquire parcels of land commonly known as Fisherman's Cove and Gull Island for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge in Monmouth County and Ocean County, New Jersey.
